channel.title: Modules on Kelly Ripple
channel.description: Recent content in Modules on Kelly Ripple

item.title: Ruby Building Blocks
item.author: kelly.ripple@bti360.com (Kelly Ripple)
item.description: I feel like a toddler. My brain hurts and nothing makes sense. The internet insists on explaining things to me like I already know things. Dear Internet, I most certainly do not. I have included here the stuff that did make sense. May these humble building blocks aid you in your own pursuit of understanding. Modules vs. Classes From my blog post on the map method, a module is a way of grouping together methods, classes, and constants - a collection of reuseable code.
